forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely before 5am, then rain and snow showers. Cloudy. Low around 33, with temperatures rising to around 36 overnight. Wind chill values as low as 23. South wind 31 to 37 mph, with gusts as high as 41 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.shortForecast: Rain And Snow Showers then Slight Chance T-storms
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain and snow showers before 8am, then rain and snow showers between 8am and 11am, then a slight chance of thunderstorms and rain and snow showers likely between 11am and noon, then a slight chance of thunderstorms and rain and snow showers likely between noon and 1pm, then a slight chance of thunderstorms and rain and snow showers likely. Cloudy. High near 37, with temperatures falling to around 35 in the afternoon. Wind chill values as low as 22. Southwest wind 16 to 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.
